Package com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.service

package com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.service
This package contains all Service classes which provide business logic in managing application classes
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project
    This package holds the Application class, which runs this Spring Application
    com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.controller
    This package contains all the Controller classes which handle web requests from the web application
    com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.model
    This package contains the main entities for the application to function
    com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.repository
    This package holds the Repository classes, which are responsible for all persistence operations
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CartItemService
    This class provides business logic for CartItem entities.
    CartService
    This class provides services for managing a customer's shopping cart.
    CustomerService
    This service provides operations for managing customers in the system.
    LikeService
    This service is responsible for managing customer likes and dislikes of products.
    OrderService
    This service class is used to create and manage orders.
    ProductService
    This class provides business logic for managing products in the system.
